oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Public Attitudes in Alberta Toward the Formerly Mentally Ill, 1990
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Odynak, Dave; Krahn, Harvey; Gartrell, John; Kinzel, Cliff
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study was designed to collect data comparable to previous studies on attitudes toward the mentally ill as well as new information pertaining to the formerly mentally ill. Many of the questions used in this survey came from the 1986 Winnipeg Area Survey.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mental illness
